text: Resul Elvan (born ) is a Turkish male weightlifter, competing in the 105 kg category and representing Turkey at international competitions. He competed at world championships, including at the 2015 World Weightlifting Championships. ==Major results== {|class = "wikitable" style="text-align:center;" ! rowspan=2 width=40|Year ! rowspan=2 width=250|Venue ! rowspan=2 width=60|Weight !colspan=4| Snatch (kg) !colspan=4| Clean & Jerk (kg) !rowspan=2 width=40| Total !rowspan=2 width=40| Rank |- ! width=40|1!! width=40|2!! width=40|3!! width=40|Rank!! width=40|1!! width=40|2!! width=40|3!! width=40|Rank |- ! colspan=13|World Championships |- |2015 || align=left| Houston, United States|| 105 kg || ~~160~~ || ~~160~~ ||161||26||201|| ~~205~~ || ~~208~~ ||22||362||22 |- |2014 || align=left| Almaty, Kazakhstan || 105 kg ||155|| ~~160~~ ||160||28||201||206|| ~~211~~ ||19||366||22 |- |2010 || align=left| Antalya, Turkey || 94 kg ||145|| ~~150~~ || ~~151~~ ||36||180|| ~~190~~ || ~~191~~ ||36||325||35 |- |2009 || align=left| Goyang, South Korea || 94 kg || ~~145~~ ||145||150||21||185||190|| ~~192~~ ||21||340||21 |} ==References== Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Turkish male weightlifters Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Competitors at the 2018 Mediterranean Games Category:Mediterranean Games silver medalists for Turkey Category:Mediterranean Games bronze medalists for Turkey Category:Mediterranean Games medalists in weightlifting
